metadata.title: CVE-2023-28486 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Sudo before 1.9.13 does not escape control characters in log messages.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-28486` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

sudo - 1.9.11p3-1ubuntu1.3
sudo-ldap - 1.9.11p3-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: sudo package in kinetic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.11p3-1ubuntu1.3').
